Package org.example.common.interfaces

Interface IBuffer<T>

Type Parameters:
T - the objects that contains in buffer
All Known Subinterfaces:
IStorage<T>
All Known Implementing Classes:
Buffer, OrderBoard, Storage
public interface IBuffer<T>
With synchronization.

  • Method Summary

    Modifier and Type
    Method
    Description
    int
    capacity()
    Return max size of the buffer.

    isEmpty()
    Check buffer for empty.

    isFull()
    Check buffer for full.

    notifyAllCanPut()
    Notify all objects that are waiting to put something int buffer.

    Notify all objects that are waiting to take something from buffer.

  • Method Details

    • notifyAllCanPut

      void notifyAllCanPut()
      Notify all objects that are waiting to put something int buffer.

    • notifyCanPut

      void notifyCanPut()
      Notify object that's waiting to put something into buffer.

    • notifyAllCanTake

      void notifyAllCanTake()
      Notify all objects that are waiting to take something from buffer.

    • notifyCanTake

      void notifyCanTake()
      Notify object that's waiting to take something from the buffer.

    • put

      void put(T object) throws InterruptedException
      Put something to the buffer. This method uses synchronized, so it's parallel save. Waits if buffer is full.
      Parameters:
      object - the object that will be stored into the buffer.
      Throws:
      InterruptedException

    • take

      T take() throws InterruptedException
      Take some object from the buffer. This method uses synchronized, so it's parallel save. Waits if buffer is empty.
      Returns:
      took object from buffer.
      Throws:
      InterruptedException

    • isFull

      boolean isFull()
      Check buffer for full.
      Returns:
      true if buffer is full

    • isEmpty

      boolean isEmpty()
      Check buffer for empty.
      Returns:
      true if buffer is empty

    • size

      int size()
      Return the current size.
      Returns:
      the currents size (amount of elements) in the buffer

    • capacity

      int capacity()
      Return max size of the buffer.
      Returns:
      max size of the buffer.
